citation.article-title: Planomicrobium flavidum sp. nov., isolated from a marine solar saltern, and transfer of Planococcus stackebrandtii Mayilraj et al. 2005 to the genus Planomicrobium as Planomicrobium stackebrandtii comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Planomicrobium stackebrandtii Mayilraj et al. 2005 comb. nov.

Planomicrobium stackebrandtii (sta.cke.brand.tiâ€²i. N.L. gen. n. stackebrandtii of Stackebrandt, to honour Erko Stackebrandt, a German microbiologist, for his valuable contributions to microbial taxonomy and molecular systematics).
Basonym: Planococcus stackebrandtii Mayilraj et al. 2005.
The description is the same as that given by Mayilraj et al. (2005).
The type strain is strain K22-03T (=MTCC 6226T=DSM 16419T=JCM 12481T).
